Sample Legal Document for Testing
==================================

This is a test document containing legal citations for the hallucination auditor system.

Paragraph 1: Introduction
-------------------------
This document discusses the legal principles established in recent case law regarding informed consent in medical treatment.

Paragraph 5: The Montgomery Principle
--------------------------------------
The Supreme Court in Montgomery v Lanarkshire [2015] UKSC 11 held that informed consent requires full disclosure of material risks to the patient.

Paragraph 7: Material Risks
----------------------------
At paragraph [42], the court stated that the duty extends to all material risks that a reasonable person in the patient's position would consider significant.

Paragraph 10: Conclusion
-------------------------
The Montgomery v Lanarkshire [2015] UKSC 11 judgment represents a significant shift in the law of informed consent.
